definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: Then they all set out for the Maidan .
sentences.chinese: 他們然後向練兵場的方向出發。

sentences.english: The battlefield became their training ground.
sentences.chinese: 戰場成了他們的練兵場。

definition: to follow up a victory and press home the attack/to pursue retreating enemy
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision
peer competition/to function as rivals/to make claims as an equal
to take turns/to work by roster
to fight with all one's might

Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
